name: SDO_DAS_XML.createDocument
purpose: Creates an XML Document object from scratch, without the need to load a document from a file or string.

return.description: Returns an SDO_XML_DAS_Document object on success.

errors:
SDO_UnsupportedOperationException
     
     
      
       Thrown if an element name or element name and namespace URI is passed,
       but not found in the underlying model.
